fraud.displayName: Has the business or anyone affiliated  been charges with any offence regarding fraud or dishonesty?

bankruptcy.displayName: Has the business or anyone affiliated been declared bankrupt or place in receivership, administration or liquidation?

convicted.displayName: Has anyone affiliated been convicted of a criminal offence?

insurance.displayName: Has insurance been refused or proposal for insurance been declined?

businessDescripton.displayName: Describe your business activities directly associated with plant operations to be insured.

damage.displayName: Do you have your own machines you wish to insure against damage?

hiredInPlant.displayName: Do you have Hired-in machines you wish to insure against Damage?

additionalBenefits.displayName: Do you have additional benefits that you'd like to increase?

financialProtection.displayName: Do you wish to insure any machines for Financial Protection?

breakdown.displayName: Do you wish to insure any machines against Breakdown Damage?

roadRisk.displayName: Do you have machines declared as Road Registered?

legalLiability.displayName: Do you wish to insure against Legal Liability for Personal Injury, Property Damage or Advertising Injury?
